r.s: Client for the del.icio.us web service.
r.d: Services_Delicious is a client for the REST-based web service of del.icio.us. del.icio.us is a social bookmarks manager. It allows you to easily add sites you like to your personal collection of links, to categorize those sites with keywords, and to share your collection not only between your own browsers and machines, but also with others. Services_Delicious allows you to select, add and delete your bookmarks from any PHP script.
r.n: QA release package 2.0 PHPUnit based test coverage Swapped to HTTP_Request2 Swapped to PHP5 only Bug #14879 Unit tests should skip if no configuration exists Request #10026 Add Support to Tag Bundles Bug #9634 foreach error on empty array Bug #8528 Invalid Response Code
